name: Pizza Salad
author: Linda Menz
instructions: Unroll crescent rolls, lay flat on cookie sheet. bake 5-8 minutes until light brown. Cool. Mix all other ingredients and spread on top of cooled crust. Dice in very small pieces 1/4 cup to 1/2 cup of fresh vegetables. Can use carrots, broccoli, radishes. Sprinkle on top of cream cheese layer and top with shredded Cheddar cheese. Refrigerate.
